data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Gabriel Xavier gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nagoya.
In the minute 2, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 15, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Ryuji Izumi puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Everaldo with an assist there.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kashima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 19, The home team have replaced Naoki Maeda with Yuki Soma. This is the first substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Nagoya's area.
In the minute 21, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 25, Kashima are pushing forward but Ryotaro Araki's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 30, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Throw-in Nagoya.
In the minute 32, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Kashima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Kento Misao (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 37, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Great finish from Ryotaro Araki to give Kashima a 0-2 lead.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 40, Sho Inagaki is booked for the home team.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Kashima a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Nagoya - Nagoya with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kashima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kashima throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Nagoya.
In the minute 47, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In Nagoya, Everaldo (Kashima) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 49, Goal! Sho Inagaki pulls one back for Nagoya to make it 1-2.
Great play from Yuki Soma to set up the goal.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
In the minute 51, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Kashima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Nagoya.
Ryogo Yamasaki is replacing Gabriel Xavier for the home team.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 61, Kashima are whistled for offside.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Shoma Doi extends Kashima's lead to 1-3.
In the minute 66, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kashima throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a third substitution, with Joao Schmidt replacing Takuji Yonemoto.
Hiroyuki Abe is on a sub for Mateus for Nagoya.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 67, The home team replace Yutaka Yoshida with Kosuke Ota.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Nagoya's Sho Inagaki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 76, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Kashima's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
In the minute 78, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
Kashima make their first substitution with Juan Alano replacing Ryotaro Araki.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Hiroyuki Abe (Nagoya) gets a yellow card.
Everaldo (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 85, Kashima to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
The away team replace Shoma Doi with Yasushi Endo.
Zago is making the team's third substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Ryota Nagaki replacing Kento Misao.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Nagoya.
Kashima have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
Ayase Ueda is replacing Everaldo for Kashima at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Ryohei Shirasaki is replacing Ryuji Izumi for the away team.
